about_the_game:
Harem Girl: Alicia is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swap tiles, in order to complete the pictured artwork.

This DLC adds a special feature to all levels of the game... A SOLVE button.

For those who absolutely have to see every image completed in every mode, except no substitute. This simple DLC adds a SOLVE button to the top left corner of each puzzle allowing you to quickly solve a puzzle and move onto the next, though at the cost of losing the bonus ability for completion.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity and sexual suggestive images.
- Not suitable for watching at work.
- Not suitable for all ages.

All characters depicted in the game are at least 18 years of age or older.

short_description: Harem Girl: Alicia is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swap tiles, in order to complete the pictured artwork. This DLC adds a quick solve feature to allow you to progress further if 'stuck' or to simply enjoy watching the game complete itself.
